name: Posthaste
description:
Posthaste is an indie game made by a solo developer.

This is Posthaste; arcade-style, fast-paced rally racing game.

  • Posthaste adds a new mechanic to arcade rally racing: Haste Meter. The Haste Meter is a fundamental feature of Posthaste. Fill your Haste Meter by drifting as far as you can, to go even FASTER!
  • Refill and use your boost to gain speed and turn sharp corners more easily.
  • Use handbrake to drift and slide your car among the road to easily turn sharp corners, focus on increasing your drift distance to increase your Haste Meter, and get even more Credits as you drift for longer distances!
  • Finish the stage as fast as possible to increase your rewards!
